title: PSA: It's School Holidays
body: Whether you play Ranked or not is completely up to you. Just giving everyone a heads up that there will most likely be angsty little shits with god complexes playing LoL 24/7 for the next 2-3 weeks.

replies.body: I've noticed. Its really, really annoying.
idk what the school holidays have to do with uni students playing league.

> [{quoted}](name=Alfawarrior3,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AxqEoXHc,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-23T22:51:38.409+0000)
>
> idk what the school holidays have to do with uni students playing league.

op means the primary school kidz

> [{quoted}](name=Garens Harem,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AxqEoXHc,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-09-23T23:44:53.183+0000)
>
> op means the primary school kidz

I know what he meant.
but does he really think they only play during school holidays?
There are 12vies that wouldn't be allowed to by parents during school.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AxqEoXHc,comment-id=0002000000000001,timestamp=2015-09-24T06:16:47.719+0000)
>
> There are 12vies that wouldn't be allowed to by parents during school.

there are still weekends though?

Which a lot of people avoid playing on anyway.

If your a person who avoids playing on weekends, avoid playing on holidays as well (personally i am someone who always avoided playing ranked on weekends.)
I know they also play throughout the school term, but at least there's a sort of 7-4 window where they're either at school, or travelling to and from school.
Lol thanks for the heads up
God help us all.. Rip elo
